p: Compared to China, Akha of Laos still retain swidden agriculture, and the fleagrass resources are preserved. Considering the economic conditions and the convenience of life in Laos, the life of the Akhas is still heavily dependent on the resources of the forest plants, so the traditional knowledge of the fleagrass has been preserved.
